extensionDescription.message: Prachtig gevisualiseerde statistieken voor je Thunderbird-e-mailaccounts

activeAccounts.color: Geef elk account een aangepaste kleur om ze in de vergelijkingsmodus te onderscheiden.
activeAccounts.description: Accounts in- of uitschakelen. Uitgeschakelde accounts worden niet weergegeven in een lijst met accounts of statistieken.
activeAccounts.label: Actieve accounts
activeAccounts.sumAndCompare: Als u meer dan één account activeert, is de optie 'Alle accounts' statistieken filter optie voor som- en vergelijkingsweergave.

cache.description: Schakel het cachesysteem in voor een snellere weergave van reeds verwerkte statistieken gegevens.
cache.label: Cache activeren

clearCache.description: Verwijder alle statistieken in de cache van alle accounts. Wordt opnieuw opgebouwd als je de statistieken pagina opnieuw opent.
clearCache.label: Cache wissen
clearCache.size: De grootte van de cache is {0}

darkMode.description: Schakel tussen donker en licht kleurenschema
darkMode.label: Donkere modus

leaderCount.description: Aantal vermeldingen weergegeven in diagrammen met frequente contacten (maximaal 999)
leaderCount.label: Leader Count

localIdentities.description: Een lijst met e-mailadressen die je kunt herkennen als 'verzonden van' voor lokale accounts
localIdentities.label: Lokale identiteiten

note.refreshCacheRequired: If changed, cache needs to be rebuild
note.reloadStatsPage: Options are automatically saved. Some option changes cannot be automatically applied to an already open stats page or to existing cache entries, if cache is activated. They are marked with corresponding icons.
note.reloadWindowRequired: If changed, stats window needs to be reloaded
note.title: Notitie

ordinate.description: Display vertical axis for all line and bar charts
ordinate.label: Vertical Axis

resetOptions.description: Reset all options to their default values. Depending on which options you changed before, a window or cache refresh may be required.
resetOptions.label: Reset Options
resetOptions.removeIdentities: This will also remove all local identities you created.

selfMessages.description: Exclude messages that were sent from me to myself

info.anyAccount: Messages where sender and receiver are identities from any account will be excluded
info.none: Messages to self will be included and treated as normal emails (default)
info.sameAccount: Messages where sender and receiver are identities from the same account will be excluded

selfMessages.label: Messages to Self

startOfWeek.description: Custom start of week for all weekday related charts
startOfWeek.label: Week starten op

tagColors.description: Draw charts about tags using corresponding tag colors
tagColors.label: Tag Colors

stats.accountEmpty: This account is empty, no emails here.

contactsJunk.description: Number of emails marked as Junk per sender
contactsJunk.title: Flagged as Junk

contactsReceived.description: Number of emails received per sender
contactsReceived.title: Most received from

contactsSent.description: Number of emails sent per recipient
contactsSent.title: Most sent to

daytime.description: Number of emails per time of day
daytime.title: Daytime

month.description: Number of emails per month of year
month.title: Maand

months.description: Total number of emails per month
months.title: Maanden

quarters.description: Total number of emails per quarter
quarters.title: Kwartalen

tagsCount.description: Total number of emails per tag
tagsCount.title: Labels

temporalDistribution.description: Number of emails per weekday per hour
temporalDistribution.title: Temporal distribution

weekday.description: Number of emails per day of week
weekday.title: Weekdag

weeks.description: Total number of emails per week
weeks.title: Weken

years.description: Total number of emails per year
years.title: jaren

stats.disclaimer:
ThirdStats makes no claim to the correctness of the data displayed.
In case of possible problems, please create a bug report.
stats.loadingInProgress: Loading of all emails from this account in progress…
stats.nonEmptyFolders: non-empty folders | non-empty folder | non-empty folders
stats.starAndImprove: Be a star, fork me on GitHub.
stats.title: Statistieken

tooltips.comparisonWhenAccountsOption:
Account comparison is only available
if more than one account is activated in add-on options
tooltips.comparisonWhenFilter:
Account comparison is only available
if 'All Accounts' is selected in accounts filter above

error.dateOrderEnd: De einddatum moet na de begindatum zijn.
error.dateOrderStart: Start date must be before end date

tooltips.exportData: Export currently displayed data as JSON file
